REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Jeffrey Carr to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes Jeffrey Carr to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Jeffrey Carr to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
